penalty_clauses.description: Clauses that impose financial penalties for breaches or delays
penalty_clauses.mitigation: Ensure penalties are reasonable and proportionate. Request caps on liability and grace periods.

indemnity_clauses.description: Clauses requiring one party to compensate the other for losses
indemnity_clauses.mitigation: Limit indemnity to direct damages, exclude consequential losses, and cap liability.

unilateral_termination.description: Clauses allowing one party to terminate the contract without mutual agreement
unilateral_termination.mitigation: Request mutual termination rights, reasonable notice periods, and cause-based termination only.

arbitration_jurisdiction.description: Clauses specifying legal jurisdiction and dispute resolution mechanisms
arbitration_jurisdiction.mitigation: Request neutral jurisdiction, reasonable arbitration costs, and option for mediation first.

auto_renewal.description: Clauses that automatically renew contracts without explicit consent
auto_renewal.mitigation: Request opt-in renewal, advance notice requirements, and easy cancellation process.

lock_in_periods.description: Clauses that force parties to continue the contract for a fixed period
lock_in_periods.mitigation: Request flexible terms, early termination options, and reasonable notice periods.

non_compete.description: Clauses restricting one party from engaging in competing businesses
non_compete.mitigation: Limit scope, duration (max 1-2 years), and geographical area. Ensure reasonable restrictions.

ip_transfer.description: Clauses transferring intellectual property rights between parties
ip_transfer.mitigation: Retain IP for pre-existing work. Limit transfer to work-for-hire. Request royalty-free licenses.

confidentiality_nda.mitigation: Define confidential information clearly, include exceptions, and reasonable duration (2-3 years).

force_majeure.description: Clauses addressing unforeseeable circumstances preventing contract performance
force_majeure.mitigation: Define events clearly, include notice requirements, and specify reasonable suspension period.

payment_terms.description: Clauses related to payment schedules, advances, and penalties
payment_terms.mitigation: Request milestone-based payments, reasonable retention amounts, and clear payment terms.

warranties.description: Clauses providing assurances about products, services, or performance
warranties.mitigation: Limit warranty period, exclude implied warranties, and cap warranty claims.

high.action: Immediate review recommended. Significant legal/financial exposure.

medium.action: Review recommended. Moderate risk that should be addressed.

low.action: Standard clause. Minor issues that can be negotiated.

general: Include cure periods for breaches (15-30 days)
Cap liability to contract value or insurance coverage
Specify dispute resolution through mediation first
Define terms clearly to avoid ambiguity
Include termination for convenience with notice
Add review periods for auto-renewal clauses
Include force majeure with clear definitions
sme_friendly: Request pro-rata refunds for early termination
Add renegotiation clauses for long-term contracts
negotiation_tips: Start with 'We propose more balanced terms...'
Include 'to the extent permitted by law'

clause_templates.balanced_termination: Either party may terminate this Agreement by providing [number] days written notice to the other party. In the event of termination, both parties shall fulfill their obligations until the effective date of termination.
clause_templates.reasonable_indemnity: Each party shall indemnify the other against direct losses arising from its breach of this Agreement, provided that total liability shall not exceed the total fees paid under this Agreement.
clause_templates.mutual_confidentiality: Both parties agree to maintain the confidentiality of each other's proprietary information for a period of [number] years after termination, excluding information that becomes publicly available through no fault of the receiving party.
clause_templates.fair_jurisdiction: Any disputes arising from this Agreement shall first be attempted to be resolved through mutual discussion. If unresolved, the parties agree to mediation before pursuing arbitration or litigation in courts having jurisdiction in [neutral location].
clause_templates.balanced_payment: Payment shall be made within [number] days of receipt of invoice. Late payments shall accrue interest at [reasonable percentage] per month. The Client may withhold payment for disputed amounts in good faith while resolving the dispute.
